description: This file defines a theme configuration class for a Flutter app, specifying color schemes, gradients, and styling for UI components following Material 3 design guidelines.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods and properties to generate a customized theme for the Flutter application using Material 3, including color schemes, gradients, and styles for various UI components.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with custom colors, typography, and component styles suitable for a light-themed Flutter app.
